title: Tighter Binds
description: Laney Holden has found exactly what she was looking for behind the door in room 237...or has she? Alex seems like the perfect man. He's caring, gentle, wonderful. The only problems are she's not allowed to see him and their relationship ends with the physical. As Laney stumbles around the gray line of love and sex, she needs to either learn to disconnect herself from Alex or find a way to live without him altogether.Tighter Binds is the second of three novellas in the Room 237 Series.
author: Emma  Payne
